articles.description: It brings the total number of bank closures to 100 so far this year
articles.content:
Barclays said it will close 15 more of its branches, taking the tally of closures across British lenders to more than 100 so far this year.
Sites in London, St Helens and Bridgwater are among those … [+1961 chars]
